text: 100px The following is a list of county routes in Union County in the U.S. state of New Jersey. For more information on the county route system in New Jersey as a whole, including its history, see County routes in New Jersey. ==500-series county routes== In addition to those listed below, the following 500-series county routes serve Union County: *CR 509, CR 509 Spur, CR 512, CR 514, CR 527, CR 531, CR 577 ==Other county routes== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
